short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steins;Gate helps automate user interactions on website like clicking, typing, checking content and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to automate repetitive tasks that you perform on the web?
Not a fan of writing code?

Then this is the extension for you!

Simply fill the user interface prompted by Steins;Gate with the actions you want to perform on webpages and hit the Run button. Steins;Gate will execute all the actions you've filled and provide realtime logs of the actions it's currently performing.
To top that, Steins;Gate will perform the actions in the active tab you trigger Steins;Gate from, which helps you visually see how Steins;Gate is interacting and executing the actions on webpages
